name: ZomBoom (yoluke, Spurgle)
description:
ONE TIME USE!

Get the zombies back into the enclosure. Try find the NUKE mod for the "Big Boom"

Unblock the roads, Find health up high, Explore the City from checkpoint to check point. Build a horde and have fun...

WASD=Move   Mouse=Look   Space=Jump   R=(one time use item)

ZomBoom

Made by Luke Lawrence and Jon Adams using Unreal Engine, Maxamo Characters, Render Hub City model...

With thanks to Honest Dale for music...

Tip our hats to Mat Aspland and Devsquad tutorial series
